climatePledgeFriendly.details: Global Recycled Standard (GRS) verifies the percentage of recycled content and tracks it from the source to the final product.

features: 100% Recycled Waterproof Fabric- Our women’s plus size puffer jackets are made with recycled polyester, which requires far fewer resources than new fibers and generates fewer CO2 emissions. The shell fabric with a 3,000mm waterproof rating effectively keeps out light rain.

Big is Beautiful - This plus size winter coat for women is made available in different modern and stunning colors. Choose from size 1X to 5X to ensure a custom, comfy, and figure-flattering fit, and show off your classic taste in clothing by sporting this zip-up jacket.

Travel in Style - Made of 50D 400T nylon, our stylish, compressible, and lightweight down jackets for women are ideal for on-the-go use with this packable down jacket's carrying pouch - perfect to bring on travels and commutes.

Windproof & Warm - Battle strong winds without worry with the women's winter jackets women can count on. Our bubble jacket for women lets you indulge in superior support and warmth even under challenging weather conditions.

Exceptional Quality - This fully-zippered and hooded packable jacket boasts a windproof design and robust construction, perfect for slight rain and snowy weather. This packable puffer coat also employs 2 zippered pockets which keeps what you need within reach.
body.description: A good choice for fashion and warmth with plus size down jacket By Wantdo What you need is a warm enough women's outdoor jacket that doesn’t skimp on quality, performance, and style! Our women's winter jacket and puffer jacket collection is designed to keep you warm and cozy in any weather condition. The puffer jacket is durable, lightweight, and incredibly warm. And if you are still troubled by the limited size chosen, our plus size puffer jacket would add 1X-5X options to your wardrobe, with features such as windproof cuffs, SBS zippers, and 3000MM waterproof index. This women's down jacket is waterproof up to 3000mm, effectively repelling rainwater. Lightweight and Warm: this women's packable puffer Jacket is made with lightweight materials for a comfortable fit, while providing warmth and protection. Down Alternative: This women‘s winter jacket is filled with high-quality down alternatives, providing the same warmth as down while reducing harm to animals. Windproof with Elastic Cuffs: Designed with elastic cuffs, this windproof jacket fits snugly around the wrists, effectively blocking out cold winds. The fully-zippered and hooded women's jacket : The down alternative jacket provides exceptional warmth and gives optimum insulation and heat preservation. Durable SBS Zipper: Equipped with SBS zippers, this lady's jacket is durable and easy to use, ensuring long-lasting wear. The women's winter jacket with multi zipper pockets keeps everything you need within reach.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Our mission is to build products that are essential for active performance wear users. We aim to create versatile products that can be worn in various conditions, whether it's hiking in the mountains or strolling around town. By designing active performance wear with features such as waterproofing, stain repellency, fast-drying capabilities, and warmth, Wantdo becomes an indispensable part of our customers' daily lives. This puffer jacket is breathable, soft, and warm, making it a must-have for cold seasons, so it can easily fit in your backpack, luggage, and duffel bag. Responsibly Sourced & Skin Friendly This women's plus size puffer jacket that you can purchase confidently, especially knowing that our products are sustainable, long-lasting, ultra-clean, and hypoallergenic. 100% Recycled Materials Women's renewable down jackets are the perfect combination of style and sustainability. Made from recycled materials, these winter jackets are not only fashionable but also protect the environment. By using renewable down alternatives, we are reducing our reliance on non-renewable resources. With features such as wind-resistant cuffs, durable SBS zippers, and 3000MM waterproof index, the renewable down alternative jacket is designed to keep you comfortable and protected in any weather condition. The hood of this winter coat for women is elastic and windproof which provides the maximum protection for your face and neck from the raging and chilly winds. Don't let sharp and icy air currents stop you! This winter thick jacket features a SBS zipper, wear this women's jacket every day with confidence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fits just right true to size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not a slim fit
reviews.reviewText: I sized up because I returned a ski jacket with the same measurements that was a slim fit. This jacket is not a slim fit. I could’ve sized down a size (maybe two). It’s fine, I can layer comfortably. I bought this to wear walking the dogs over the winter. It’s light, but warm. Four deep pockets! Big hood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love that it is stylish

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pros: warmComfortableFits in my chest area wellCons: sleeve length is a bit longNo way to secure hood around head.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I liked the jacket. It runs small tho and they need to put a better zipper in it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but sized wrong
reviews.reviewText: I got a 2X and I can’t zip up the coat. However, I gave it a 3 star because it fits well otherwise and it VERY well insulated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very light weight
reviews.reviewText: This jacket is fantastic because it’s lightweight and easily stored. When I hike I warm up fast I need to start shedding layers. This jacket is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The best jacket ever. It’s warm and cozy.
Beautiful coat, nice material but it was too big for me. True to size though.... I just misjudged my size.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice Jacket it is a good buy for the money.
reviews.reviewText: I bought size 3X for I am a big person but needed something roomy and light weight for I am disabled. You can move better. This jacket was exactly what I needed. Nice looking also.

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautiful warm Jacket. Very Fast shipping!!
reviews.reviewText: This jacket is amazing!!! It's always so hard to find a nice jacket for plus size ladies. I love this!! Fits perfectly and so warm. It also shipped very quickly!!
This coat is beautiful! Wonderful color, light weight and warm. Wish I got smaller size
Light weight, keep you warmGreat product
